title: Emerald Radiance Pearl Jhumka: Enchanting Jadau Elegance
materials: Freshwater Pearls. Features premium Hyderabadi polish for a lasting luster.
features: Multi-tiered Jhumka design showcasing intricate filigree work. Floral motif at the stud with an Emerald center, followed by a paisley design drop. The Jhumka bell is adorned with CZ stones arranged in a petal formation and finished with delicate pearl drops. Offers a modern take on traditional Jadau craftsmanship.
colors: White (CZ diamonds and Pearls). The combination of emerald and gold is considered auspicious in South Indian traditions.
occasions: and traditional ceremonies like Seemantham (సీమంతం) and Half-Saree functions. Also suitable for upscale parties and cultural events.
description: This Jhumka seamlessly blends traditional Telugu craftsmanship with modern aesthetics. The use of high-quality CZ diamonds provides a dazzling sparkle. The emerald center stone represents prosperity and growth, while the pearl drops symbolize purity and wisdom. A timeless design perfect for the discerning modern woman.
